content.text: Match ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 0, Juventus 1.
Second Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 0, Juventus 1.
Offside, Juventus. Alessandro Matri tries a through ball, but Emanuele Giaccherini is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Razvan Rat (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Fernandinho.
Substitution, Juventus. Emanuele Giaccherini replaces Sebastian Giovinco.
Attempt missed. Alessandro Matri (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Arturo Vidal with a headed pass.
